example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2SpotFleetInstance -SpotFleetRequestId sfr-73fbd2ce-aa30-494c-8788-1cee4EXAMPLE
InstanceId InstanceType SpotInstanceRequestId ---------- ------------ --------------------- i-f089262a c3.large sir-12345678 i-7e8b24a4 c3.large sir-87654321
example.description: This example describes the instances associated with the specified Spot fleet request.
